price: 126. Kani waa Jidka Rabbigaa ee toosan. Waxaan uga yeelnay Aayadaha caddaan ciddii xusuusan oo waantoobi.
arabic: وَهَٰذَا صِرَٰطُ رَبِّكَ مُسۡتَقِيمٗاۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wahādhā ṣirāṭu rabbika mus'taqīman qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yadhakkarūna
